value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Another year, another June! And you
know what that means... Blushing
brides are on their way!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yeah... I guess June brides are pretty
cool...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Aww, what's the matter, Commander?
Don't tell me you've got the "always
the bridesmaid" blues!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If only it was so simple. Remember
last year? We fought so hard for the
Wedding Bouquet, only to learn...$k$pIts blessing is nontransferable! Even
if we win it again, I can't sell it.
Weddings are useless to me!$k$pUgh... It's not like we have to go,
right? Let's just stay home instead.$k$pCome on, we'll lounge around in our
cozy clothes all day. No reason to get
all gussied up if there's no profit in it!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gosh, I never thought I'd miss greedy
Commander Anna... Well, I need to
get my hands on that bouquet.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What?! Sharena, it can't be! You're
still so young, yet you're already
planning your marriage?$k$p(Think of how it'll reflect on someone
of my station if my subordinate gets
married before me...)$k$pAs your commander, I will not allow it!
I will not become known as
Commander Spinster!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander... What? Where'd you
get— W-wait, that's not important.
The bouquet is for a friend—not me!$k$p$EFace|Oh, the reason doesn't matter,
Commander! Just dig down deep for
some charity and help me out!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|To be honest, this outfit had me a bit
flustered when I first put it on... But it
is well suited to this festival.$k$pAnd what a great festival this is!
Everyone appears so happy. It's
exactly as Caeda described.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Wedding18,Face|Hm... You sure are cavalier about this
whole thing. We're about to engage in
a bloody battle to the death...$k$pOver a bunch of flowers.$k$pWhich, once I win... My fated one and
I will live happily ever after. Hee hee
hee...$k$pOh, dear, but we're in public... People
can see! Hee hee, OK, just a quick
kiss... Hmhmhm...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|Um... Pardon me, miss, but... Are you
OK? You seem to be daydreaming as
our opponents approach.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Wedding18,Face|Grr... I'm not giving up yet. Not when
my happily ever after is at stake.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|I have someone I wish to surprise
with the Wedding Bouquet as well.
Let us regroup and try again.$k$p$Sbs150|
